extendedInfo.description: This is a plugin of 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)'.*** This app does not open on its own. ***Please first install the main app 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)' from Google Play before using this plugin:http://goo.gl/yuDqJor you can download from our homepagehttp://www.dailyyoga.comThis session is to guide you through the traditional sequence of Sun Salutation with detailed demonstrations of how breathing is coordinated with posture performing. Sun Salutation is one of the most traditional sequences in yoga practice formed by a group of asanas that originate in behaviors of honoring the sun. The sun is regarded by ancient hindus as the heart of the world. She gives birth to lives and casts lights on human souls. To salute the sun is to show our gratitude for the infinite lights and warmness, and for the wisdom and self-illumination she brings to us.Sun Salutation is the best warm-ups before a standard yoga class. Via postures of chest contracting and extending movements, it boosts up the respiratory system for more healthy breathing while promoting better blood circulation. As the brain gains sufficient oxygen, you are more likely to focus attention. All these will bring your body to an active state that makes complicated asanas become much easier.Let the sun soothe our body and soul, Namaste!

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: It is an amazing application. For everyone who can\'t find it after downloading, you have to first download the Daily Yoga (All - In - One) before you can enjoy the treasures of this application.
reviews.author: Eieza Cocodia

reviews.title: Got me out of a wheelchair
reviews.comment: @ Eva and Leigh:  Yoga definitely helps! I have been diagnosed with Fibromyalgia,  among other things, and yoga has definitely helped. This particular set is something that I had to work up to; I started with the lying down exercises and then I moved on to the sitting exercises.   I really liked that this app has such sets for us that have to start with low mobility and move up.   This is my first set Out of the bed,  and upright.   Wish me luck!
reviews.author: Pati Aceves

reviews.title: Fun =D
reviews.comment: One pose 6 mo\'s ago and kept adding poses, now I am addicted to yoga!  =D  This app is perfect to train for actual classes.  Leigh - I have a whole host of injuries from working in a cubicle including fibromyalgia.  Yoga has given me hope, so I would say \"Yes, it def helps and I would def recommend it for arthritis.\"    Cubicles are torture devices, stay away at all costs! I\'m being facetious, but seriously though...
reviews.author: Eva Jimenez

reviews.title: PART 1 :first time trying yoga
reviews.comment: i have alot of hip issues and swelling in my feet really bad im only 33yrs old..ive put on alot of weight due to swelling in my lower extremidies. does this help to loose weight as well and could it help with swelling.my feet r 3times bigger than they should be and so r my lower legs. will it help with that i also have authritis in my hips really bad... if anyone could please answer me back i would appreciate it so much...ive been to many specialist and theu cant find out whats wrong with me and i love to
reviews.author: Leigh Bradford

reviews.title: Yoga fan :-)
reviews.comment: Have been yoga for a year now- 3/4 times a week and I feel a huge difference in my mental n physical help. When I can\'t make it for my classes I use thsee daily yoga applications, which are really great!

reviews.title: Modified Review
reviews.comment: This is a great sun salutation set.  I used this app to get into the habit of doing yoga every morning as soon as I get out of bed.  The 5 minutes I invest in Yoga increases my energy for the rest of the morning.
reviews.author: James Lemon

reviews.title: Couldn\'t be happier
reviews.comment: Once again, I\'m so pleased with these plugins. I love the varying degrees of difficulty and wide range of routines. Some days I\'m ready for a harder work out and some days I\'m just not feeling up to par and I have the option of a nice light work out. Even the simple breathing routine or the short 5 min Sun Salutation can help you feel like you\'ve done something, even if you don\'t feel well or you are very busy. I am just so happy I found this app and its many fun plugins. Thank you so much!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is quick and easy i absolutley love it =)
